00029 uvm_resource_pool* uvm_resource_pool::m_pool = NULL;

00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 //
00034 uvm_resource_pool::uvm_resource_pool()
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //
00041 uvm_resource_pool::~uvm_resource_pool()
00042 {
00043     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00044 
00045 
00046     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00047     {
00048         for (int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00049         {
00050             if ((*it->second)[i] != NULL)
00051                 delete (*it->second)[i];
00052         }
00053         it->second->clear();
00054     }
00055     m_resource_q_map.clear();
00056 }
00057 
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 
00063 uvm_resource_pool* uvm_resource_pool::get()
00064 {
00065     if (m_pool == NULL)
00066         m_pool = new uvm_resource_pool();
00067 
00068     return m_pool;
00069 }

00072 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 
00079 void uvm_resource_pool::set(uvm_resource_base* rsrc, bool override)
00080 {
00081     std::string name   = rsrc->get_name();
00082     resource_q* rsrc_q = NULL;
00083     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it_map;
00084     resource_q::iterator it_q;
00085 
00086     it_map = m_resource_q_map.find(name);
00087     if (it_map != m_resource_q_map.end())
00088         rsrc_q = it_map->second;
00089     else
00090         rsrc_q = new resource_q();
00091 
00092     it_q = std::find(rsrc_q->begin(), rsrc_q->end(), rsrc);
00093     if (it_q != rsrc_q->end())
00094         rsrc_q->erase(it_q);
00095 
00096     if (override)
00097         rsrc_q->push_front(rsrc);
00098     else
00099         rsrc_q->push_back(rsrc);
00100 
00101     m_resource_q_map[name] = rsrc_q;
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 
00109 void uvm_resource_pool::set_override(uvm_resource_base* rsrc)
00110 {
00111     set(rsrc, true);
00112 }

00124 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_by_name(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00125 {
00126     resource_q rsrc_q = lookup_name(scope, name, type_id); 
00127     return get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);    
00128 }
00129 
00130 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 
00140 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_by_name_regex(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00141 {
00142     resource_q rsrc_q = lookup_regex(scope, name, type_id); 
00143     return get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);    
00144 }

00147 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 
00156 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_name(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00157 {
00158     resource_q *        rsrc_q; 
00159     resource_q          rsrc_result_q; 
00160     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00161     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(uvm_glob_to_regex(name));
00162 
00163     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00164 
00165     it = m_resource_q_map.find(name);
00166     if (it != m_resource_q_map.end())
00167     {
00168         rsrc_q = it->second;
00169         for (int i = 0; i < rsrc_q->size(); i++)
00170         {
00171             if ( (*rsrc_q)[i]->match_scope(scope) && (typeid((*rsrc_q)[i]) == type_id) )
00172                 rsrc_result_q.push_back((*rsrc_q)[i]);
00173         }
00174     }
00175 
00176     return rsrc_result_q;
00177 }
00178 
00179 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 
00189 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_regex(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00190 {
00191     resource_q          rsrc_q; 
00192     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00193     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(uvm_glob_to_regex(name));
00194 
00195     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00196 
00197     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00198     {
00199         int j = 0;
00200         if (uvmsc_boost::regex_match((const std::string) it->first, what, re))
00201         {
00202             for (int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00203             {
00204                 if ( (*it->second)[i]->match_scope(scope) && (((*it->second)[i])->get_value_type_id() == type_id) )
00205                     rsrc_q.push_back((*it->second)[i]);
00206             }
00207         }
00208         j++;
00209     }
00210 
00211     return rsrc_q;
00212 }
00213 
00214 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 
00221 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_scope(const std::string& scope)
00222 {
00223     resource_q   rsrc_result_q; 
00224 
00225     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00226     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00227     {
00228         for (int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00229         {
00230             if ((*it->second)[i]->match_scope(scope))
00231                 rsrc_result_q.push_back((*it->second)[i]);
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     return rsrc_result_q;
00236 }
00237 
00238 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 
00245 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_highest_precedence(resource_q& rsrc_q)
00246 {
00247     uvm_resource_base * rsrc = NULL;
00248     unsigned int precedence;
00249 
00250     if (rsrc_q.size() > 0)
00251     {
00252         precedence = rsrc_q[0]->get_precedence();
00253         rsrc       = rsrc_q[0];
00254         for (int i = 1; i < rsrc_q.size(); i++)
00255         {
00256             if (rsrc_q[i]->get_precedence() > precedence)
00257             {
00258                 precedence = rsrc_q[i]->get_precedence();
00259                 rsrc       = rsrc_q[i];
00260             }
00261         }
00262     }
00263 
00264     return rsrc;
00265 }
00266 
00267 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 
00273 void uvm_resource_pool::sort_by_precedence(resource_q& rsrc_q)
00274 {
00275     std::sort(rsrc_q.begin(), rsrc_q.end(), &uvm_resource_pool::rsrc_prec_compare);
00276 }
00277 
00278 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00280 
00288 bool uvm_resource_pool::rsrc_prec_compare(uvm_resource_base * rsrc1, uvm_resource_base * rsrc2)
00289 {
00290     if (rsrc1 == NULL)
00291         return false;
00292 
00293     if (rsrc2 == NULL)
00294         return true;
00295 
00296     return (rsrc1->get_precedence() > rsrc2->get_precedence()); 
00297 }

00299 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 
00308 void uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_queue (
00309     uvm_resource_base*       rsrc,
00310     resource_q &             rsrc_q,
00311     uvm_resource_priority_e  priority
00312 )
00313 {
00314     resource_q::iterator it;
00315     it = std::find(rsrc_q.begin(), rsrc_q.end(), rsrc);
00316 
00317     if (it != rsrc_q.end())
00318     {
00319         rsrc_q.erase(it);
00320         if (priority == PRI_HIGH)
00321             rsrc_q.push_front(rsrc);
00322         else
00323             rsrc_q.push_back(rsrc);
00324     }
00325     else
00326     {
00327         std::cout << "WARNING: uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_queue() Resource not found int queue" << std::endl;
00328     }
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00334 
00339 void uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_name(uvm_resource_base* rsrc, uvm_resource_priority_e priority)
00340 {
00341     resource_q* rsrc_q = NULL;
00342 
00343     rsrc_q = m_resource_q_map[rsrc->get_name()];
00344     if (rsrc_q != NULL)
00345     {
00346         set_priority_queue(rsrc, (*rsrc_q), priority);
00347     }
00348     else
00349     {
00350         std::cout << "WARNING: uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_name resource name not found in pool" << std::endl;
00351     }
00352 }
